author: sky.cactus
content: Also, we should put pressure on authors of all of those EIPs to get them moved into review.  First one I clicked on has a number of editorial issues that need to be addressed which would be caught by an editor reviewing it (which will happen when a PR is created to move it to review status).

content: Just having Geth be "not code merged" doesn't fully capture the situation.

author: timbeiko
content:
I feel like we should update these to point towards the specs repo so people who go to the eips website know it has changed: 
* https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2070
* https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2378

author: sky.cactus
content: My weak preference would be to just remove them.

author: sky.cactus
content: The EFI one may not have all of its information available elsewhere at the moment (not sure).

author: timbeiko
content: I'm a bit concerned that anyone who hasn't followed the process would not know where to find these things. Afri asking on twitter is a good example imo. But not a super strong opinion üëç

author: sky.cactus
content: I feel like there are few enough people following the process that don't follow ACD calls that we can just redirect them when they ask.

author: sky.cactus
content: That is, I don't think we need a formal process for redirecting users because it is a relatively small problem that we can deal with on an ad-hoc basis.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: I'm for removing the content
